name: Fantastic Gorgonzola and White Wine Cheese Ball
author: SDESROSIERS1
summary: A huge success! This cheese ball featuring the sharp flavors of Gorgonzola and white wine is very popular with my Italian family.  You can substitute chopped parsley or mixed herbs for the paprika.
ingredients: ¼ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: In a medium bowl, blend cream cheese, Gorgonzola cheese, sharp Cheddar cheese and white wine
Form the mixture into a ball shape
On a piece of wax paper, spread the paprika and pistachio nuts
Roll the cheese ball in paprika and pistachios to coat
Wrap coated cheese ball in wax paper
Chill in the refrigerator 6 hours, or overnight, before serving
